course_title: Discovery Seminar: Natural Sources of Medicine
class_notes: (Permission of Instructor Required Prior to Enrollment)
course_description: Introduces students to ways of knowing and producing knowledge within a field of study. Emphasizes inquiry and development of critical thinking and research abilities through exploration of a specific topic.
